defaultMessage: Review the applicants in the Veterans and Canadian Citizens section. If none or very few of these applicants meet the requirements, you can still consider non-Canadian Citizen applications in the Optional Consideration section
In this group you will find the applicants who are not Canadian Citizens or do not claim to meet the essential criteria.
These applications have already been screened out.
